mapper.select: SELECT n.notification_id AS id, nt.notification_template_title AS title, nt.notification_template_content AS content, n.notification_created_at AS createdAt FROM notification AS n JOIN notification_template AS nt ON n.noti_template_id = nt.notification_template_id JOIN member AS m ON n.notification_received_member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY n.notification_created_at DESC LIMIT 10
